summary: Comprehensive testing of Datalyn SaaS application completed successfully. Tested all core features including landing page, authentication flows, dashboard metrics, AI chat with Claude Sonnet 4.5, integrations, settings, and navigation. Both backend APIs and frontend UI are working well.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for existing user signup
minor_issues.impact: Minor - API correctly returns user data when user exists

integration_issues.issue: Occasional loading delays on integrations page
integration_issues.impact: Minor - page eventually loads correctly with all functionality

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero, features, pricing, testimonials sections
User signup creates account and redirects to dashboard
User login authenticates and redirects to dashboard
Dashboard displays 4 metric cards (MRR, Users, Conversions, Churn)
Dashboard shows 30-day revenue chart with realistic data
Dashboard displays 3 anomaly alerts with proper styling
AI Chat interface loads with example questions
AI Chat sends messages and receives Claude Sonnet 4.5 responses
AI Chat displays reasoning steps in expandable accordion
Integrations page shows 6 integration cards with toggle switches
Integration toggles work and update connection status
Settings page loads profile and notification preferences
Settings allows name updates and notification toggles
Sidebar navigation works across all pages
User logout redirects to login page
UI follows design guidelines with proper fonts and colors
